a1: Nigeria did well to make it to Russia, for sure.
q2: Is Nigeria the only team to make it to World Cup from Africa?
a2: No, the African teams of Nigeria, Egypt, Senegal, Morocco and Tunisia all qualified to the 2018 FIFA World Cup.
q3: How far did Nigeria make it in the world cup
a3: I believe they got knocked out in the group stages.
a4: Jon Obi Mikel is a good scorer
q5: Who is the best defender on the Nigerian team?
a5: I think Joseph Yobo, he is a very strong player.
